name: NSControl.ImagePosition
desc: A constant for specifying the position of a button’s image relative to its title.

items.name: case noImage
items.desc: The cell doesn’t display an image.

items.name: case imageOnly
items.desc: The cell displays an image but not a title.

items.name: case imageLeading
items.desc: The image is on the title’s leading edge.

items.name: case imageTrailing
items.desc: The image is on the title’s trailing edge.

items.name: case imageLeft
items.desc: The image is to the left of the title.

items.name: case imageRight
items.desc: The image is to the right of the title.

items.name: case imageBelow
items.desc: The image is below the title.

items.name: case imageAbove
items.desc: The image is above the title.
